attributes.action: Suspend EU exit and review the Leave Campaign for deleberatley misleading voters
attributes.additional_details:
1 example: 

Leave Campaign bus - "we send the EU £350 million a week let's fund our NHS instead Vote Leave" 

"A poll by Ipsos MORI published on 16 June found that nearly half the British public believed the claim." (independent.co.uk) 

Less than a day after victory a significant supporter and Leave figurehead said - "No I can’t [guarantee it], and I would never have made that claim. That was one of the mistakes that I think the Leave campaign made.” (N. Farage on Good Morning Britain 24/0616)
attributes.background: The 'Leave Campaign' have run their referendum showcase based on flashy adverts, promises and slogans which we now know won't be kept, voters feel they have been victims of 'False Advertising'. Simply put this wouldn't be legal for a pair of trainers let alone a referendum of such significance.
